parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Locations </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return the closest location of specified class to a given position.<br>Checked range is unlimited (i.e. covers the whole map). </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[nearestLocation]] [position, locationClass] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [position, locationClass]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> position: [[Object]] or [[Array]] in format [[PositionAGL]] or [[Position2D]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> locationClass: [[String]] of a location class name. If "" is supplied, any nearest location is returned. See [[Location#Location Types|Location Types]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Location]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_nearestCity = [[nearestLocation]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[getPos]] [[player]], "nameCity"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_anyNearestLocation = [[nearestLocation]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[player]], ""];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[findNearestEnemy]], [[nearestBuilding]], [[nearestObject]], [[nearestObjects]], [[nearObjects]], [[nearEntities]], [[nearTargets]], [[nearSupplies]], [[nearestLocationWithDubbing]], [[nearObjectsReady]], [[nearRoads]], [[Location#Location Types|Location Types]], [[locationPosition]], [[nearestLocations]], [[createLocation]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
